name: Murder Crab Island
description:
Return to Monkey Crab and claim your throne as the one true Crustaceous King.

I recommend hosting matches Parsec if you want to get some matches in if you don't have any local Crabs to play with.

Version 1.0  1.0.2 is out now!  There will be a v1.1 patch this upcoming weekend that'll include some bug fixes as well as add some new features.  Hopefully CPU crabs are working by then (\/) (°,,,,°) (\/) 

  • Local 1-4 Players (Can be increased to 6 by altering crab.ini settings file)
  • Team Crab Battles are possible yes.
  • No CPU/Bot Crabs... Yet...
  • Despite the intended grayscale aesthetic, there are 3 additional crab colors for accessibility purposes.
  • Randomly Generated Maps.  Kinda janky, but it works.
  • Generated Map Codes can be saved, shared, and customized (No In-Game Map Editor).
  • Pressing [↑] (or [←] + [→] on Keyboard) will raise your claws to the heavens.
  • Pressing [Y] (or [Claw] on Keyboard while hands are raised) will snap claws.
  • ゴゴゴゴ Beckons The [REDACTED] (This will make sense soon *cough* v1.1 *cough*)
  • You can modify game rules (Like DMG modifiers) via the crab.ini settings file.
